<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106014</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106014</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209469</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Modes and Ragas: More Than just a Scale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Modi und Ragas: Mehr als gerade eine Skala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modes et Ragas : Plus que juste une 
échelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modalidades e Ragas: Mais do que apenas uma 
escala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modi e Ragas: Più appena una scala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρόποι και Ragas: Περισσότερο από ακριβώς μια
κλίμακα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modos y Ragas: Más que apenas una escala</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Many musical traditions, in history as well as in the modern world, are based on modes or ragas rather than on major and minor scales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viele musikalische Traditionen, in der Geschichte 
sowie in der modernen Welt, basieren auf Modi oder ragas anstatt auf 
Major und Untersatzskalen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Beaucoup de traditions musicales, dans l'histoire 
aussi bien que dans le monde moderne, sont basées sur des modes ou 
des ragas plutôt que sur des échelles de commandant et de mineur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Muitas tradições musicais, no history as.well.as
no mundo moderno, são baseadas em modalidades ou em ragas melhor que 
em escalas do major e do menor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Molte tradizioni musicali, nella storia così come
nel mondo moderno, sono basate sui modi o sui ragas piuttosto che 
sulle scale del minore e del maggiore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολλές μουσικές παραδόσεις, στην ιστορία καθώς 
επίσης και στο σύγχρονο κόσμο, είναι βασισμένες στους τρόπους ή
τα ragas παρά σε σημαντικές και δευτερεύουσες κλίμακες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Muchas tradiciones musicales, en historia así 
como en el mundo moderno, se basan en modos o ragas más bien que en 
escalas del comandante y del menor de edad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

              <value>author</value>

        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

            </role>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106014</entry>
